title: Q7 - What is the relationship between a Data Fiduciary and a Consent Manager — is one more powerful than the other?
description: - A Data Fiduciary is the organization that collects and processes personal data (e.g., banks, insurers, e-commerce platforms).

previous.title: Q6 - What happens if a Data Fiduciary fails to comply — does liability sit only with the company, or can directors and officers also be held responsible?

next.title: Q8 - If there is a dispute between a Fiduciary and a Consent Manager (e.g., over proof of consent), who resolves it?
